title: unit occlusion.
body: so, i was in a game, playing top lane, and my opponent is getting in my face a little, while i farm, the thing is though, his character model completely blocks the minion model, so i miss it, why it that a thing? because it seems unfair that i not only miss cs because I'm not great at it, but my opponent can stand right in the middle of it and make me miss more.
